roleset.name: Remove a sample of tissue for analysis/diagnosis

example.name: Tissue as Arg1
example.text: In a patient with fibrocystic breast disease, you-NP1 can't just keep *PRO*-1 biopsying masses that appear every time they appear.
example.arg: masses that appear every time they appear

example.name: Patient as Arg1
example.text: Is it the standard of care *PRO* to biopsy all patients with fatty liver on ultrasound?
example.arg: all patients with fatty liver on ultrasound

roleset.note: Based on medical QA corpus (Framed by Anwen 07/19/10)
